rev.comment: Wikipedia is not a link bank
cleaned-up, this is not a news site

"Mariah Carey have expressed disapproval..." reference is irrelevant; replaced it with {{fact}} template
changing from big ugly tag to small unobtrusive icon

fixing infobox to comply with standards

rv. she is NOT better known by the name Esther
/* Early life */ Madonna's mother was not French Canadian. She wasn't born in Quebec. She's of French Canadian descent. She's technically a French American or Franco-American.
/* Criticism */ User Downtownstar moved "Queen of Pop" to the criticism section and said "i moved the queen of pop statement where it belongs - i hope this pleases everyone..."
/* Criticism */ I thought the whole queen of pop mess had been settled. The term is not a broadly used term for her.
